text.div:
Claim Information Category Codes

This value set includes sample Information Category codes.

Copyright Statement: This is an example set.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/claiminformationcategory defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
info InformationCodes conveying additional situation and condition information.
business Business ArrangementInsurance business arrangement identifier.
school Name of SchoolName of School.
accident Accident InformationThe type, date and place of an Accident.
onset OnsetPeriod, start or end dates of aspects of the Condition.
related Related ServicesNature and date of the related event eg. Last exam, service, Xray etc.
employment EmploymentThe start and optional end dates of when the patient was precluded from working due to the treatable condition(s).
hospitalization HospitalizationThe start and optional end dates of when the patient was confined to a treatment center.
missingtooth Missing ToothMissing tooth with tooth code, reason and extraction date.
material Materials ForwardedMaterials being forwarded, eg. Models, molds, images, documents.
other OtherOther information identified by the type.system.

name: Claim Information Category Codes
description: This value set includes sample Information Category codes.

concept.definition: Codes conveying additional situation and condition information.
The type, date and place of an Accident.
Period, start or end dates of aspects of the Condition.
Nature and date of the related event eg. Last exam, service, Xray etc.
The start and optional end dates of when the patient was precluded from working due to the treatable condition(s).
The start and optional end dates of when the patient was confined to a treatment center.
Missing tooth with tooth code, reason and extraction date.
Materials being forwarded, eg. Models, molds, images, documents.
Other information identified by the type.system.
